meanings.definition: The quality or state of being flirtatious.
meanings.sent1: Her flirtatiousnesses were evident in the way she giggled and batted her eyelashes.
meanings.sent2: His flirtatiousnesses often made others feel uncomfortable in social settings.
meanings.sent3: At the party, her flirtatiousnesses led to many awkward encounters.
meanings.sent4: The flirtatiousnesses of the cat trying to catch the laser pointer was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent5: The flirtatiousnesses of the flower petals as they swayed in the breeze caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The behavior or actions of someone who is flirtatious.
meanings.sent1: His flirtatiousnesses towards his coworker were quite obvious to everyone in the office.
meanings.sent2: She used her flirtatiousnesses to get free drinks at the bar.
meanings.sent3: The monkey's flirtatiousnesses towards the zoo visitors entertained the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The flirtatiousnesses of the waves as they danced along the shore were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The flirtatiousnesses of the wind as it played with the leaves created a playful atmosphere in the park.
